about_the_game: Original soundtrack for Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising, the latest addition to the GBVS fighting game series featuring beloved characters from Granblue Fantasy. This complete collection includes all character battle themes from Season 1, along with tracks from Story Mode, Arcade Mode, and beyond!
